name: CPU
description: The computer's central processing unit (CPU) is the portion of a computer that retrieves and executes instructions.

name: MotherBoard
description: The motherboard is the backbone that ties the computer's components together at one spot and allows them to talk to each other

name: Hard Drive
description: Hare drive is magnetic storage medium for a computer. Hard disks are flat circular plates made of aluminum or glass and coated with a magnetic material.

name: RAM
description: RAM is the super-fast and temporary data storage space that a computer needs to access right now or in the next few moments.
